name: Twistingo: Hummingbird Haven Collector's Edition
description: Set off on a heartwarming journey in 'Twistingo: Hummingbird Haven,' where nature's beauty meets puzzle-solving fun! A solar eclipse and a storm have endangered the island's hummingbirds. Your task is to find them, rebuild their homes, and restore the island's charm. Engage in hidden object searches, complete puzzles, gather unique amulets and revel in the stories of the local community. Join this memorable quest to save Hummingbird Haven!
